document.full_text: post-election riots in northern nigeria have killed at least 50 people in major cities alone, according to a tally from witnesses and rescue workers, but the overall death toll is believed to be much higher.
document.title: bodies in streets after nigeria election riots
lines_and_colors: post-election riots in northern nigeria have killed at least 50 people in major cities alone, according to a tally from witnesses and rescue workers, but the overall death toll is believed to be much higher.
